name: spook.exe
description:
YOU HAVE FOUND AN OLD FLOPPY DISK
… in a dusty box in the attic of your new home. Having just setup all your rad 1990s PC gear, you make no hesitation to fire up the disk and see what secrets the previous owner has left for you and - oh my god, you've been sucked into the computer!

Use arrow keys to explore the world.

Press z to pickup things.

Made for LowRezJam 2016, where the challenge was to limit your resolution to 64x64 pixels. I forgot to submit until the last few minutes (literally) and so failed to upload it in time.
